Line3.6D03F: He challenges my perspective in a way few have. We’ve made solid discoveries in the short time we’ve spent together; I suspect many more to come.
VoiceDir1.6D03F: A little more optimistic then Lorath usually is--this is written decades ago.
Line1.6D03F: The mage Donan has proved to be a wonderful addition to our Order. The man has knowledge in spades. Any topic, even the most mundane, becomes profound in his care.
